title: OXO Food Mill
description: The OXO Good Grips Food Mill is the perfect tool for preparing fresh purees, sauces, soups and more. It has a stainless steel inner bowl that is ideal for hot foods and will not stain, and includes three stainless steel grinding discs for fine, medium and coarse textures. Use the fine disc for homemade jellies, creamy sauces and baby food, the medium disc for applesauce and vegetable soups, and the coarse disc for mashed potatoes and chunkier sauces. The Food Mill has a unique release button that makes it easy to exchange discs and disassemble for storage. Three non-slip legs hold the Food Mill securely over bowls and pots up to 11 inches in diameter, keeping it out of your food. The legs also fold for easy storage. The soft, non-slip handle and knob ensure comfort when gripping the Food Mill and turning the blade. All parts are dishwasher-safe.

asset.author: OXO

transcripts: If you've grown a bumper crop of tomatoes for canning or have a bushel of apples for some fresh apple sauce, a food mill is going to make quick work of it all. The OXO food mill has a stainless steel interval that is ideal for hot foods and will not stain. It includes three stainless steel grinding disks for fine, medium, and coarse textures. Use the fine disk fro homemade jellies, creamy sauces, and baby food. The medium disk fro apple sauce and vegetable soups, and the coarse disk for mash potatoes and chunkier sauces. The soft comfortable non slip handle and knob ensure comfort when gripping the food mill and turning the blade. Three non-slip legs hold the food mill securely over bowls and pot up to 11 inches in diameter keeping them out of your food and the legs also for easy storage. The food mill has a unique release mechanism that makes it easy to exchange disks and dissemble for storage. All parts are dish washer safe. Here's a good tip. Though you'll want to cook your foods before putting though the food mill. You can leave or the fruit or vegetable whole. There's no need to remove the skin or seeds before milling.
